## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstprinter">HexagonInstPrinter</a></>}>
Prints bundles as a newline separated list of individual instructions Duplexes are separated by a vertical tab \\v character A trailing line includes bundle properties such as endloop0/1. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstprinter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
